infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: Placemarks uses your location to help you discover nearby places, show relevant recommendations, and save your favorite spots with location context.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: Placemarks uses your location to help you discover nearby places, show relevant recommendations, and save your favorite spots with location context.
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: Placemarks needs access to your camera to let you take photos of places you visit and add them to your check-ins.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: Placemarks needs access to your photo library to let you select photos of places you visit and add them to your check-ins.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: Placemarks needs permission to save photos you take of places to your photo library.
